caption: Relating to the age of criminal responsibility and to certain substantive and procedural matters related to that age.
summary: This bill raises the age of criminal responsibility from 17 to 18 years old in Texas, meaning 17-year-olds will be processed through the juvenile justice system rather than adult criminal courts. The bill also adjusts various age thresholds in juvenile justice procedures upward by one year. This change does not specifically target Chinese immigrants but affects all youth in Texas regardless of nationality. The bill takes effect September 1, 2027.
translation: 该法案将德克萨斯州的刑事责任年龄从17岁提高到18岁，这意味着17岁的青少年将通过少年司法系统而不是成人刑事法庭处理。该法案还将少年司法程序中的各项年龄标准上调一年。这一变化并不专门针对中国移民，而是影响德克萨斯州所有青少年，无论其国籍如何。该法案将于2027年9月1日生效。
